interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: InstaNatural Cellulite Cream - With Caffeine & Retinol - Body Firming Solution & Tightening Lotion for Thigh Area, Buttocks & More - No Wrap Needed - Anti Cellulite Control Treatment - 4 OZ Review Date: 2015/11/27 Store: InstaNatural Product Description: ['Reduce Cellulite and Tighten Your Skin With our Retinol & Caffeine Firming Cream As time progresses, both men and women will experience puckering and dimpling of cellulite in the following areas: - Thighs - Stomachs - Hips - Arms - Chest Our Cellulite Cream is packed with antioxidants and moisturizing ingredients to help improve skin tone and texture: - Specialized REGU-SLIM formula that tones, tightens, and improves the skin - Moisturizes and hydrates skin - Contains Retinol, Caffeine, Jojoba Oil and Vitamin E for supreme nourishment With InstaNatural, rest assured you will receive the best customer care and highest-quality Cellulite Cream around. - Premium blend of natural ingredients - 4 oz jar gives you more value for less expense - Made in the USA - Cruelty-Free'] Average Rating: 3.2 Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.2 x 3 x 3.2 inches; 6.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '616913954721 852661007238', 'Manufacturer': 'SETAF'} Review Text: To help this cream to work on my abdomen I also purchased detox tea and a waist trainer. I drink my tea, which helps me to get rid of bloating, I apply my Cellulite Cream, let it absorb, then I Put on my t-shirt and put my waist trainer on top. The waist trainer helps to keep my abdomen warm and triggers the ingredients in a cream (caffeine, retinol, Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can apply it for yourself. I also apply it on my neck 2x day as well.
I received this cream with a discount for trying, testing and reviewing Review Title: Vitamin C as well as many other ingredients) to star working better. That is my personal suggestion and you can ... Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Anti Aging Skin Care Serum for Men & Women From Uptown Cosmeceuticals Offers Spin Trap® Intelligent Antioxidant, Advanced Scientific Formula Promotes Younger Looking Face, 30mL Uptown Cosmeceuticals {'Product Benefits': 'Anti-Aging', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Uptown Cosmeceuticals', 'Material Feature': 'Antioxidant', 'Unit Count': '1.0144 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.6 x 1.7 x 1.7 inches; 0.8 Ounces', 'UPC': '685987989205'} Since I received this serum with a great discount I shared this skin care product with my friend , so she could provide her opinion.
She used it for several day and that's what she found out:
1. Nice, presentable packaging and good design.
2. Very pleasant scent (citrus and spring flowers kind) very fresh
3. Hypoallergenic (she has EXTREMELY sensitive skin)
4. Her husband tried it and stated that is helped him with pores
I could add to that that the package arrived very fast and even the full price with the discount is acceptable compare to other serums from the mall. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Care Focus:** Prefers anti-aging and firming products suitable for both men and women, with a particular interest in addressing issues like cellulite.
- **Sensitivity Awareness:** Values hypoallergenic properties, showcasing awareness and consideration for sensitive skin, both personally and for others.
- **Aesthetic Sensibility:** Appreciates packaging design, suggesting that presentation plays a role in the user's selection process.
- **Fragrance Preference:** Favors pleasant, fresh scents like citrus and spring flowers, indicating a preference for uplifting, natural fragrances.
- **Social Influence:** Shares experiences with friends, reflecting a tendency to seek and consider others' opinions before finalizing personal skincare choices.
- **Value-Conscious Shopping:** Attracted to discounted products and considers price competitiveness when assessing quality, demonstrating a budget-conscious approach to skincare shopping.
- **Speed of Delivery:** Values quick shipping, indicating that efficiency in purchasing is important to the user.
- **Holistic Approach:** Shows a trend towards integrating different wellness strategies, such as combining topical treatments with dietary supports and fitness aids, suggesting a comprehensive approach to body care.

Overall, the user displays a trend toward quality skincare solutions that are effective, affordable, sensitive skin-friendly, appealing in presentation and scent, while also embracing holistic strategies for skin health and wellness.
